description:
Nine years after I had a minor role, the lady I served, became a master and came to find me.

It’s been four years since the original heroine ended her married life. But a handsome man came to see me.

I used to serve him in the past.

“I’m here to for you to keep your word, Blair. You said you’d be with me for the rest of your life.”

“You can’t be… Miss?”

At one point, she had a twinkle in the man’s red eyes.

He bowed his head and kissed my hair.

And whispered in a very sweet, beautiful voice

“You should call me Master now.”

***

But there was one big secret in the original novel that stopped being serialized.

What if the heroine turns out to be a man?

“Claude, is it okay if you don’t have to go to your family?”

“I told you, I don’t need it.”

“Then the man from last time.”

“Are you going to talk about another man in front of me?”

These are the main characters that should have been connected to you.

“I just need you. Nothing else matters.”

The one who was supposed to be the main character, declared that he would drop everything and be with me.

“So Blair, just look at me.”

There was an obsession in his eyes that was getting brighter and brighter.>
